Oil-based ink is odorless, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $4.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:57:57 UTC – Details)



Package includes 4 pieces of fine point black permanent markers, suitable for applying in a home, gardening, work, and other kinds of long-term marking work, which can meet your daily needs.
Mr. Pen garden marker is made of opaque ink that is chemically stable, lightfast, and quick-dry. Oil-based ink is odorless, non-toxic, acid-free, and environmentally friendly.
Durable fine round nib allows smooth and precise application. Our permanent pen markers that are short in size and have smooth and quick drying ink, can optimize your writing experience.
Mr. Pen garden markers are ideal for working on multiple surfaces; they can be applied to paintings, ceramics, wood, leather, plastic, fabric, canvas, stone, glass, metal, chalkboard, craft supplies, etc.
They are suitable for vegetable seedlings, greenhouses, gardening projects, pot experiments, etc. They will help you never lose track of what you planted.

Product Description

Great For Garden Use

For gardeners, plants and vegetables are very important to them.

Especially during bad weather with strong wind and snow, you should need garden fabric (such as row cover or plant cover, or shade cloth), but the good garden clips are also a necessary part of your garden, they can fix the garden fabric in place to extend the growing season.

Beside garden clips, they also can be great food bag closure clips, clothespins, binder clips, photo clips, beach towel clips, etc.

We are sure they will become ideal accessories for you.

About Samhopo

Samhopo means “hopes”, which is also the name of a remote village.

The founder is coming from this very poor and backward place. She is eager to do something to help the people get out of there and have a better life, so there is “Samhopo”

The purpose of the brand is to sell affordable products all around the world to help people live more conveniently.

Large Open Heavy Duty Greenhouse Clips

Feature

Material: stainless steel（Note: the spring part is not stainless steel.）

Length:approx. 2 inch

Width: approx. 1.1 inch

Single clip weight: approx. 0.2 ounce

Package includes:40 x Greenhouse Clips

Have a strong grip Good spring action Sturdy and durable. Smooth edges Easy to Use

MULTI-USE Garden Clips

They will be helpful to anyone who wants them for garden use

Suitable for many hoops of different thickness.

Diameter in closed state approx 3/8”

Maximum diameter in open state approx 3/4”

can be adapted to many different sizes of poles,hoops,stands or pipes.

Why choose our Greenhouse Clamps

Note

Please be concerned about the size before you buy.

Please allow slight size errors due to manual measurement.

GOOD SPRING ACTION: Samhopo garden clips has a thick spring, which has good spring action and can be adapted to most different sizes of garden hoops, stands, pipe or poles. Easy to open and strong. These greenhouse clamps have a strong grip and will not disintegrate like plastic.
MULTI-USE PRODUCT: These greenhouse clips are strong enough to hold down the netting on your raised garden beds or row cover on your garden hoops when it’s a windy day. They will be helpful to anyone who wants them for garden use. Aside from garden use, they make great food bag closure clips, clothespins, binder clips, photo clips, cord clips for hanging up string lights, etc.
SUITABLE FOR MANY HOOPS OF DIFFERENT THICKNESSES: These garden clips have good spring action and strong grip, Diameter in closed state approx 0.36 inches, Maximum diameter in open state approx 0.8 inches, Can be adapted to many different sizes of greenhouse hoops, poles, pipe or stands.
DURABLE MATERIAL: These greenhouse clamps are made of stainless steel(Note: The spring part is not stainless steel), sturdy and durable. They are more durable than wood clips or plastic clips. The clips snapped on easily and held the frost blankets and greenhouse cover in place through high winds and heavy snow.
PACKAGE INCLUDES: 40pcs stainless steel greenhouse clips. Size of the clamp: Length approx. 2 inches, Width approx. 1.1 inches, Single clip weight 0.2 ounce. Please be concerned about the size before you buy.

Warranty & Support

Price: $89.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:19:20 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Bring your home to life with our extensive range of planting products. From planters, plant hangers, plant stands, garden statues and raise beds to grow lights, we have everything a stylish plant lover needs.

Decorative products that make life more beautiful and comfortable, that’s what POTEY stands for. Create a pretty home for your plants to live in and add heaps of character to your garden with the selection of our beautiful products.

Raised Garden Bed

POTEY PLANT STAND & SHELF

POTEY Raise Beds

Create Beautiful Green Garden

【Raised Garden Bed with Greenhouse】This galvanized raised garden bed kit contains a planting bed, a greenhouse, and 2 greenhouse covers. With our perfectly matches combo set, no need to buy each of them separately, to make sure your favorite planting grows well through the whole year. POTEY raised garden beds size: 5.4 L * 1.6 W *0.8 H (FT), greenhouse cover size: 2.3 W * 2.5 H (FT).
【2 Different Use Greenhouse Cover】POTEY raised garden bed come with PE cover and PE net, PE cover used for winter, to keep warm, and prevent vegetables and plants from being affected by low temperature; PE net used for summer, to protect your vegetables and plants while ventilating.
【Innovative Soil Ventilation Holes】Creating a planting environment in a plant box is different from the natural environment, where soil respiration is vital. Our plant box is equipped with vent holes that can replace fresh oxygen, making sure the plant roots grow well and strong.
【Strong Connecting rods】In order to keep the garden box more stable, we added 2 connecting rods in the middle of the garden box. Compared to other planting beds without rods or using thin iron sheets as rods, our connecting rods are more durable and have a long service life.
【Thickened Material】Galvanized raised garden beds are made of solid steel plates galvanized layer which average thickness of galvanized sheet reaches 0.6mm, can stay in contact with the soil for a long time. If you have any problems during use, please feel free to contact us, and we will solve your problems ASAP.

POTEY Galvanized Raised Garden Bed with Greenhouse

Why Choose Potey?

Bring your home to life with our extensive range of planting products. From planters, plant hangers, plant stands, garden statues and raise beds to grow lights, we have everything a stylish plant lover needs.

Decorative products that make life more beautiful and comfortable, that’s what POTEY stands for. Create a pretty home for your plants to live in and add heaps of character to your garden with the selection of our beautiful products.

More reasons you’ll love this raised garden bed:

With Two Different Use Greenhouse Covers – The raised garden bed is equipped with a PE cover to keep plants warm in winter and prevent vegetables and plants from being affected by low temperatures; equipped with a PE net used in summer to protect plants from insects.

High-Quality Thickened Material – The raised garden bed outdoor is made of solid steel plates galvanized layer, the average thickness of galvanized sheet reaches 0.6mm, can stay in contact with the soil for a long time, and is resistant to corrosion. Maintains its original shape even after many years of use.

Easy to Installation – This planter box outdoors is easy to install, with instructions detailing every step of the product’s installation details and a clear and concise installation video to assist you with the installation.

POTEY-GARDEN BEDS KIT PACKAGING INCLUDES:
  • Straight iron sheet * 6
  • Curved iron sheet * 4
  • Connecting rod * 2
  • Installed screw * 1 （box）
  • Clamps * 8
  • PE Plant Fabric * 2
  • Greenhouse Hoops * 4
  • PVC Transparent Pipe * 3

POTEY Raised Garden Beds with Cover

Two practical protective covers

POTEY continuously optimizes its products based on market research and customer feedback; this upgraded planter boxes outdoor has 2 different greenhouse covers to meet the growing needs of plants throughout the year.

POTEY found that plant lovers would like to have their own open space to experience planting and explore plant secrets. At this time, POTEY garden beds are the best choice.

  • ADVANTAGE – Surround air vents on all sides
  • ADVANTAGE – Suitable for growing needs of any plant
  • ADVANTAGE – Reasonably sized for most usage scenarios
  • ADVANTAGE – Strong connecting rod ensures long-term stability
  • ADVANTAGE – All parts are made of more than 0.6mm metal materials

Read more

SHOW BETTER PRODUCT DETAILS

Multiple Sets of Vent Holes

  • Simulate natural land respiration
  • Make sure the soil has enough oxygen during plant growth
  • Avoid soil compaction

Metal Material

  • Galvanized
  • More than 6mm thickness
  • Overall solid steel material
  • Not easy to corrode, rust

Strong Connecting Rods

  • Ensuring that the garden bed does not deform during long-term use
  • Most garden beds do not have rods, they will deform, fall apart, and collapse under long-term soil compression

Read more

PE cover for winter warmth

The combination of the galvanized raised garden bed and the PE greenhouse cover ensures that the plants are kept warm in the cold winter, preventing the vegetables and plants from being affected by the low temperature.

PE net for summer insect control

Build a PE net outside the raised garden bed, which can not only keep the planter boxes outdoor ventilated and easily absorb water, but also protect the plants from insects.

2 Different Use Greenhouse Covers

With this perfectly matches combo set, no need to buy each of them separately, to make sure your favorite planting grows well through the whole year.

Read more

Plants can be grown in raised garden beds with greenhouse all year round to create a beautiful courtyard.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $69.99 - $47.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:46:47 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Heart of Hydroponics

The pump is to hydroponics what the heart is to humans, QYO’s water circulation system pumps the oxygen and nutrients to your plants dynamically while making no more noise than a whisper.

Changing Water Is A Breeze

Thanks to the QYO patented drainage hole on the back of the hydroponic growing system, changing the water and cleaning the tank will no longer be a hassle for you.

Watering, Less of A Question Mark.

Forget the worries of under or overwatering, the water level gauge shows the amount of water in the tank at a glance.

Farm Your Imagination

Don’t just stop at strawberries, lettuce, arugula, endive, spinach and spices, QYO hydroponic garden with 19.7inch extandable rod so you can grow even bigger palnts like peppers, tomatoes, cucumbers, peas, rosemary, basil and more.

Better Light, Faster Growth: Adapting the newest SMD LED technology with full-spectrum light technique, QYO’s 70 LED 24W grow light delivers all the wavelengths needed for plant growth. The Hydroponics Herb Garden’s SMD LED grow light delivers 30% more luminous flux than traditional grow light for plants to maximize photosynthesis and speed up growth by 5x, while it also creates a perfect temperature, allowing plants to germinate and grow quickly, even in winter.
Quiet Auto Water Circulation System: Advanced Deep Flow Technique is applied for the hydroponic garden, professional water pump runs every 30 minutes to generate a regular water flow, creating a perfect ecosystem for roots. In this technique, oxygen and nutrients are better delivered to the roots, allowing plants to grow faster and healthier. The water pump also keeps the water fresh and clean while operating with extremely low noise.
Free from Constant Watering: Surprise yourself with 18 days of self-sufficient growth in just 1 watering, guaranteed by Indoor Garden’s 4.5L ultra-large water tank and exclusive formula nutrients. Its unique deeper tank provides larger space for roots to develop and breath, while the escalated plant foods provide all the nutrients plants need and improve the water quality to keep plants fresh. With its water level gauge, you can know at a glance when to add water.
Grow All You Want: Don’t just stop at strawberry, with the 19.7inch extendable rod, 9 planting pods and two growing modes, you can grow even taller and larger plants in our Indoor Herb Garden, including pepper, tomato, cucumber, pea, rosemary, basil, lettuce, arugula, endive, spinach, spice, oregano, parsley, harvest chervil and more. Grow ANYTHING you love with our indoor garden even in bitterly cold winter and in apartments without ample sunlight.
68 In 1 Pack: All you need included: Hydroponics System x1, sponge x 18, rod x 9, tag x 9, seedling dome x 9, basket x 9, pod label x 9, solid nutrients x 2, AC/DC adapter x1, manual x 1. This indoor garden comes with a 365 day warranty, any questions about our products, or need any technical support, we will resolve them within 24 hours.

The Heart of Hydroponics

The pump is to hydroponics what the heart is to humans, QYO's water circulation system pumps the oxygen and nutrients to your plants dynamically while making no more noise than a whisper.

Changing Water Is A Breeze

Thanks to the QYO patented drainage hole on the back of the hydroponic growing system, changing the water and cleaning the tank will no longer be a hassle for you.

Watering, Less of A Question Mark.

Forget the worries of under or overwatering, the water level gauge shows the amount of water in the tank at a glance.

Farm Your Imagination

Don't just stop at strawberries, lettuce, arugula, endive, spinach and spices, QYO hydroponic garden with 19.7inch extandable rod so you can grow even bigger palnts like peppers, tomatoes, cucumbers, peas, rosemary, basil and more.

Product Description

Purifying the air and good for health

XXXFLOWER is committed to the design and production of DIY decorations for garden, home, office, kitchen and bathroom. The design style is retro and charming, adding a simple and classic feel to your living space.

Perfect Combination

Natural wood has a unique textures, light but firm, high transparent borosilicate glass is smooth without scratches,allowing you to observe the growth of plants more clearly. Great for growing houseplants and can purify indoor air and good for health

More Stable Design

The metal swivel holder passes through the glass bulb, which is convenient to change the water and not easy to knock over.Propagates your plant’s babies in style, slim glass container provides plenty of room for plant’s roots and all are visible for observing its growth condition.

Best Patio Decoration

Super Stability and Smooth

Planter Tips

Retro wooden plant propagation station glass for Desktop , perfect for growing plants houseplants, for example water plants or fern.
